response.explain: The previous action code successfully executed the subtask of taking the bacon out of the fridge. The bacon is now in the robot's inventory. The next step is to move the robot to the stove.
response.subtask:
(1) Move the robot to the fridge
(2) Open the fridge
(3) Take the bacon out of the fridge
(4) Move the robot to the stove
(5) Turn on the stove
(6) Cook the bacon on the stove
response.code:
def act(robot,env,camera):
    # Subtask 4: Move the robot to the stove
    stove = registry(env,"stove_rgpphy_0")
    MoveBot(env, robot, stove, camera)
    donothing(env)
